MajorClaims.MC1: I would agree to idea of taking a break before starting higher education

Claims.C1: Students who take break, gain lot of benefits by traveling around the places or by working
Claims.C2: Experience gained through traveling to different places, meeting different people and even at job goes long way
Claims.C3: Taking a break not just has benefits but it also comes with some negative impacts

Premises.P1: They tend to contribute more due to their real world experiences which makes them more mature
Premises.P2: It not only enhances the confidence of a student but also makes them independent
Premises.P3: Student's who works tend to gather better financial resources which they can rely on during their university studies
Premises.P4: This experience also makes them aware of what they would like to make of their life
Premises.P5: They develop broader view and can make a better choice of their future studies or courses
Premises.P6: They might even find it difficult to adapt to education environment
Premises.P7: There is also a risk of student never going back to university or higher education
Premises.P8: Probably some might take some short term courses instead of proper and complete university education, which will help them to get a better job and salaries
Premises.P9: This might only help them in a short run as it is a known fact that to make a reasonable career in longer runs, one needs a proper and higher qualification
Premises.P10: Once student's starts earning, they might not like to go back to studies where they would lose their financial independence
